name: Sarah Johnson
review: FlexCode transformed how we hire event staff. The ML matching is incredibly accurate, and we've reduced no-shows by 80%.

name: Marcus Chen
review: Best platform for finding quality event gigs. The payment system is secure and I always get paid on time. Highly recommend!

name: Emily Rodriguez
review: The reliability scoring system helps us find trustworthy professionals. We've hired over 50 workers through FlexCode with zero issues.

name: David Kim
review: Real-time chat and job notifications make coordination seamless. I've doubled my monthly bookings since joining.

name: Lisa Thompson
review: Hired 30+ professionals for our festival through FlexCode. The bulk hiring feature and escrow system saved us countless hours.

name: James Wilson
review: The match scores are spot-on! I only see jobs that fit my skills and location. No more wasting time on irrelevant postings.
